name: Acorncom
body:
# Howdy and welcome to my GitHub page
There isn't much to see here at the moment, but I'll be slowly adding things as I go.

### About Me
I've been doing web development since 1998 in various capacities and have a keen interest in UX problems in every project I work on.  I realize more and more that UX is something that has to be thought about from the very beginning of a project if it is going to work successfully for the folks we're working for.

I currently primarily use PHP (in a variety of projects - Yii, Magento, Drupal, Wordpress, etc), but have had experience with Objective-C, Python, Perl and more over the years.

### Projects contributing to
I've been contributing to the following projects recently:

* [Yii](https://github.com/yiisoft/yii)
* [XUpload](https://github.com/Asgaroth/xupload) - maintainer

### Contact Me
It's easiest to contact me through my [website](http://www.acorncomputersolutions.com) at the moment.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
